settings.faq_question_1: When will my pre-order be dispatched?
settings.faq_answer_1: All pre-orders will be dispatched starting November 1st. You’ll receive a confirmation email with tracking as soon as your order is on its way.
settings.faq_question_2: Will my entire order ship together?
settings.faq_answer_2: Yes, your full order will ship once the pre-order item becomes available. If you’d like faster delivery of in-stock items, we recommend placing two separate orders.
settings.faq_question_3: Can I cancel or change my pre-order?
settings.faq_answer_3: Yes, pre-orders can be changed or canceled anytime before dispatch. Just reach out to our support team and we’ll take care of it.

settings.faq_answer_1:
Standard shipping: 4–7 business days
Express shipping: 3–6 business days
You’ll receive tracking details once your order ships.
settings.faq_answer_2:
Standard shipping: €5,95
Express shipping: €8,95
Free shipping is available on orders above €60.
settings.faq_answer_3: We currently ship across the EU, UK, US, Canada, Australia, and New Zealand. At checkout you’ll see the available options and rates for your location.
